I have a client with the same type of thing.=A0 These phone calls came from=
 ph numbers that were not in service, some were fax numbers.=A0 It was a ch=
ild' voice and it said 'You know where my mother is, I want my mother', dif=
ferent numbers, same message each time.
=A0
Pretty odd but apparently it do=
es happen=A0 . . . :)

--- On Sat, 11/1/08, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@yahoo.c=
om> wrote:

From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]=
 Unusual EVP
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Saturday, November 1, 2008, =
12:12 AM






I had a call left on my cell phones answering machine. From =
nobody or no number said which is weird in itself because it always says wh=
at number called at the start of voice messages or will say if its unlisted=
/blocked. I posted some results from that on my esnips.

At first I thought=
 somebody sat on thier phone and didnt know it dialed me but only a couple =
people had that phone number because I dont use my cell much. The recording=
 went on and on and I used alot of my minutes just listening trying to make=
 out who it was that had called. the more I listened the more I realized th=
ere were a few voices and evp on there so I transferred it to my pc and ana=
lyzed it. 

Misty
